item.title: Last monkey on the loose after Mississippi highway crash is captured after being spotted by resident
item.description: Authorities have captured the last monkey that escaped after a highway crash in Mississippi

item.title: Trump taps DEI critic to lead workplace civil rights agency
item.description: President Donald Trump has appointed Andrea Lucas as chair of the nation's top workplace civil rights agency

item.title: Average US long-term mortgage rate ticks up to 6.22% after four straight weekly declines
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year U.S. mortgage ticked up for the first time in five weeks after falling to its lowest level in more than a year last week

item.title: Trump is hosting Central Asian leaders as US seeks to get around China on rare earth metals
item.description: President Donald Trump is set to host leaders of five Central Asian countries for White House talks
